plugin.name: CronPro Plugin
plugin.author: Dan Hoover
plugin.description: CronPro is a Cron receiver for UserSpice primarily designed for scheduling and maintenance-related tasks. The gist of how it works is that you set your servers's cron manager to hit this plugin at a regular interval. When hit, the plugin looks in the database to see if there are any scheduled tasks. If there are, it runs them and marks them complete. Requires PHP 7.2 or later.
